fields.name: Supervisor TimeSheet Sign
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[supervisor]] please approve hours for your worker(s) . Please approve or change the hours submitted by clinking the link [[get_url]] Please do so urgently so that workers can get paid for hours worked. If you cannot access the link simply reply LOGIN to this email and a new link will be sent to you. Alternatively you can submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you!
fields.message_html_template:
Hi [[supervisor]] please approve hours for your worker(s) . Please approve or change the hours submitted by clinking the link [[get_url]] Please do so urgently so that workers can get paid for hours worked. If you cannot access the link simply reply LOGIN to this email and a new link will be sent to you. Alternatively you can submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you!
Kind regards,
PiipAi team

fields.name: Trial E-mail verification success
fields.message_html_template:
Trial E-mail verification success

Hi [[contact__first_name]],

Good news! Your free 30 day trial account is setup for [[master_company]]!

Username: [[contact__email]]
Password: [[password]]

Your portal access is through [[subdomain]].piipai.com.

You can start using it now! Our account manager will contact you in 1 business day. He/she will help you to finalize additional setup is needed and will organize online and onsite training for your company!

Best Regards,
PiipAi Administrator

fields.name: E-mail verification success
fields.message_text_template:
Dear [[contact]],

Welcome to PiipAi - human resources automation framework!

Your newly generated password is:

[[password]]

Username: [[username]]

You can change this password after logging in!

To access our self-service portal please go to:
Address: [[master_company_url]]

If you have any questions about PiipAi, please let us know. We would be happy to help!

Kind regards,
[[manager]]
[[master_company]]
fields.message_html_template:

fields.name: Candidate TimeSheet Hours (old shift)
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[candidate_contact]] please click on the link [[get_fill_time_sheet_url]] to submit your timesheet for hours worked on [[shift_end_date]]. Once you have submitted your hours, your site foreman today will be asked to approve them. Please make sure you are accurate and honest or your hours will not get approved. If you are unable to open the link, please submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you.
fields.message_html_template:
Hi [[candidate_contact]] please click on the link [[get_fill_time_sheet_url]] to submit your timesheet for hours worked on [[shift_end_date]]. Once you have submitted your hours, your site foreman today will be asked to approve them. Please make sure you are accurate and honest or your hours will not get approved. If you are unable to open the link, please submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you.
Kind regards,
PiipAi team

fields.name: Generated password
fields.message_text_template:
Dear [[contact]],

You have requested a password change! Your newly generated password is:

[[password]]

We recommend you to change this password on your next login.
You can use the following login details to access it:
Address: [[site_url]]
Username: [[email]]

If there's anything we can do to help about login related issues or if you have any questions about PiipAi, please let us know. We are happy to help.

Kind regards, PiipAi team

fields.name: Supervisor TimeSheet Sign Reminder
fields.message_text_template: Hi [[supervisor]] we have not yet received your approval for the hours worked on your jobsite today. Please approve or change the hours submitted by clicking the link [[get_url]] or open on your computer https://piipai.com. Please note failure to do so, will result in workers not getting paid for today, and can affect the price of your next order. If you have any issues please contact [[portfolio_manager]] [[portfolio_manager__contact__phone_mobile]] immediately. Thank you
fields.message_html_template:
Hi [[supervisor]] we have not yet received your approval for the hours worked on your jobsite today. Please approve or change the hours submitted by clicking the link [[get_url]] or open on your computer https://PiipAitest.com. Please note failure to do so, will result in workers not getting paid for today, and can affect the price of your next order. If you have any issues please contact [[portfolio_manager]] [[portfolio_manager__contact__phone_mobile]] immediately. Thank you
Kind regards,
PiipAi team

fields.name: Trial User Register
fields.message_html_template:
Trial User Email Verification

Hi [[contact__first_name]],

Thanks for signing up!
You’re just one step away from fully activating your new PiipAi trial account.

Please hit the verification button below, enter your details and experience our cloud-based software! Verify Once done, we will send you an email with your login details and further instructions.

Best Regards,
PiipAi Administrator

fields.name: Sms Balance Ran Out
fields.message_text_template: Dear [[contact__first_name]], Your sms balance in PiipAi has ran out, please top-up your balance now to re-activate services. No sms are getting currently sent out and functionality is limited. Best Regards, PiipAi Team
fields.message_html_template:
Sms balance has ran out

Dear [[contact__first_name]],

Your sms balance in PiipAi has ran out, please top-up your balance now to re-activate services. No sms are getting currently sent out and functionality is limited.

Best Regards,
PiipAi Team

fields.name: Sms Balance Is Low
fields.message_text_template: Dear [[contact__first_name]], Your sms balance in PiipAi has dropped below 20 [[currency]], please top-up your balance now to avoid service suspension. No sms will be sent out if this happens and functionality will be limited. Best Regards, PiipAi Team
fields.message_html_template:
Sms balance has ran out

Dear [[contact__first_name]],

Your sms balance in PiipAi has dropped below $(currency should be country specific)20, please top-up your balance now to avoid service suspension. No sms will be sent out if this happens and functionality will be limited.

Best Regards,
PiipAi Team

fields.name: Consent message
fields.message_text_template:

Employment database PiipAi has your data previously collected. Potential employer has requested acces to your data including your contacts to reach you. If you agree to share this data, please open the link below and click on Approve button!.
 [[candidate_consent_url]]

fields.name: Consent message
fields.message_text_template:
База данных по трудоустройству PiipAi содержит ваши данные, собранные ранее. Потенциальный работодатель запросил доступ к вашим данным, включая ваши контакты, чтобы связаться с вами. Если вы согласны поделиться этими данными, перейдите по ссылке ниже и нажмите кнопку «Подтвердить»!
 [[candidate_consent_url]]

PiipAiin työllisyystietokanta sisältää aiemmin kerätyt tiedot. Mahdollinen työnantaja on pyytänyt pääsyä tietoihisi, mukaan lukien yhteystietosi, ottaakseen sinuun yhteyttä. Jos suostut jakamaan nämä tiedot, seuraa alla olevaa linkkiä ja napsauta "Vahvista" -painiketta!
